history.proof: unfold is_gcd. split; [| split]. - apply divides_1. - apply divides_1. - intros k H1 H2. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: No such bound variable x' (possible names are: x, y, x0 and y0).

original: unfold is_gcd. simpl. split; [| split]. - apply divides_1. - apply divides_1. - intros k H1 H2. apply Nat.divide_wd with (x:=k) (x':=1) (y:=p) (y':=1). + apply Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg; auto. + apply Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg; auto.
